item.title: Jesse Vincent talks about Request Tracker at NPW
item.description:
(this video is from a weekly series that we are uploading from Nordic Perl Workshop 2006 to promote the upcoming Nordic Perl Workshop 2009)

I've used Request Tracker for many years. It's a terrific tool for keeping track of customer requests. With the latest versions, it even looks good.
